Translations.Text: Inna: "anwa ay d awal nnwen, a yimceggaan
Nnan: "nekwni neppuceggaa d ar ugdud ibe$wviyen
Iwakken a ten neooem s ueou n talaxt
i ipwaoecmen s$uo Mass ik i ucmiten
Nessuffe$ kra illan, degs, n lmumnin
Nufa kan degs, yiwen uxxam n imvuaen
Neooa p id d assekni i wid iugaden aaaqeb aqeoean
I di Musa, mi t id Nuzen i Feraun, s udabu n uuee
Iaaua, akked imalalen is, inna: "d aseeear, ne$ d aoehbani
Neddem it, neppa akked iasekriwen is, Nveggeo iten ar yill. Tiyta degs
I di Aad, mi sen Nuzen avu asexvi
Ur ippaooa ayen immuger, alamma irra t am rrmim
I Tamud, mi pwanecden: "siwa tallit ara tezhum
Auuan lameo n Mass nnsen. Tewwet iten id ssiaqa, nitni la pwalin
Ur zmiren a d kren, ur pwasellken
Agdud n Nue, uqbel, llan, s tidep, d agdud iballa$en
Igenni, Nebna t s loehd, d Nekwni it Issewsaan
Tamurt, Nessa p. Ay gerzen Wid Itessun
Di yal cci, Nexleq tayuga, ahat a d tesmektim
Ihi, srifget ar Oebbi. Nek, ih, s$uoeS ar $uowen, d aneddao ipbegginen
Ur saut, ar tama n Oebbi, oebbi nniven! Nek, ih, s$uoeS ar $uowen, d aneddao ipbegginen
Akka, ur iusi umazan ar wid i ten id izwaren, mebla ma nnan as: "d aseeear ne$ d aoehbani
Day ppuweuuan $ef waya? Xaii, nitni d agdud izegren tilas
Iiixxeo asen; ur deg k tiyta
Smektay ed. Asmekti, s tidep, infaa lmumnin
Xelqe$ leonun akked imdanen, iwakken kan ad iyI aabden
Ur b$i$ segsen ooeeq, ur b$i$ ad iyi cceccen
Oebbi, s tidep, d Aoeeeaq, d Bu tezmert n uuee
Ih, i wid idensen, amur am umur imeddukwal nnsen. Ulay$eo iyI $euben
A tawa$it n wid ijehlen, ilmend n wass i sen ippuwaaaden
S udrar
S Tezmamt ippujerrden
di lka$ev ivelqen
S texxamt iaamoen
S tseddarit aalayen
S yill icebbwlen
Aaaqeb n Mass ik, s tidep, ad ivou
Ur isai ara t sfunngen
Ass ideg ara imbwiwel igenni, d ambwiwel
Ad leun idurar, d tikli
A ssexv, assen, n wid iskiddiben
Wid inexoen deg uraren
Ass ideg ara pwaveggoen ar tmes n Loahennama, d aveggeo
Apan tmes nni i la tnekoem
D sseur waya, ne$ d kunwi ur nwala ara
Kecmet ep. Iauva fellawen, tueboem, ne$ ur teubioem. A ppeppuqeiiim kan $ef wayen txeddmem
Wanag wid ipeezziben, di leonanat, akked zzhu
Feoeen s wayen i sen Ifka Mass nnsen. Isellek iten, Mass nnsen, seg uaaqeb ujajie
acet, teswem, di lehna, ilmend n wayen txeddmem
eelen af imieoeen, d idurra; d tieuoiyin lain ukud iten Njewweo
Wid iumnen, u aanden ten, warraw nnsen, ar liman nnsen, a ten Nessemlil akked warraw nnsen. Ur Nessenqas acemma seg igiten nnsen. Yal amdan ad immager ayen ikseb
Ad asen d Nefk izwayen akked uksum seg wayen cedhan
Dinna ad ppemyeppaken lkas, ideg ur illi usieomel, ne$ ssebba n tuccva
